statement.title: Problem Description
statement.content: Alice and Bob are playing a game. There are two piles of cards. There are N cards in each  pile,  and  each  card  has  a  score. They  take  turns to  pick  up the top  or  bottom  card from either pile,  and the score of the card will be added to his total score.  Alice and Bob are both clever enough, and will pick up cards to get as many scores as possible. Do you know how many scores can Alice get if he picks up first?

statement.title: Input
statement.content:
The first line contains an integer T (T��100), indicating the number of cases.
Each case contains 3 lines. The first line is the N (N��20). The second line contains N integer ai (1��ai��10000). The third line contains N integer bi (1��bi��10000).

statement.title: Output
statement.content: For each case, output an integer, indicating the most score Alice can get.
